model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Fabian SÃ¶rensson & Anton Bergman This is the model class. The code follows the Model-View-Controller design pattern. The model class handles all the game logic and is essentially unaware of the view and the controller.
